techmeme.title: Tether's investment arm says it aims to invest $1B+ in financial infrastructure, AI, and biotech over the next year, after spending ~$2B over the past two years (Olga Kharif/Bloomberg)
Customer service automation startup Cognigy, whose AI agents can talk to tens of thousands of users at once, raised a $100M Series C and reports ~175 clients (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
TechInsights: Nvidia shipped ~3.76M data center GPUs in 2023, up from 2.64M in 2022; the total data center GPU market was 3.85M in 2023, up from ~2.67M in 2022 (Agam Shah/HPCwire)
Cyberhaven, which uses AI to help companies predict employee behavior and avoid insider threats, raised $88M led by Adams Street Partners at a $488M valuation (Sarah McBride/Bloomberg)
As the EU's MiCA crypto regulation takes effect on June 30, the industry remains uncertain about the ramifications; some stablecoin rules arrive in late 2024 (James Hunt/The Block)
